room_title: Escape room "Horror Movie" by The Key Haunted Escape Rooms in Indianapolis
room_description: It’s a creepy late-day matinee at the dilapidated Key Cinema with today’s feature…”Horror Movie”. This game requires observation of not only the room but the movie as well! A year in the making, this game runs the gamut between the enjoyable things in life like fun puzzles, hot popcorn (bug-free! we promise!) and comedy, sprinkled with shockingly graphic and horrifying images that will make you feel truly thankful to be alive.
